title: Documentation: Clean up temporary documentation files
description: Remove or consolidate COMMIT_MSG.txt, GITHUB_SETUP.md, TESTING_PLAN.md, and PLAN.md files. These appear to be development artifacts that should either be integrated into main docs or removed.

title: Test and publish to TestPyPI
description:
Follow PYPI_PUBLICATION_CHECKLIST.md to:
1. Run full test suite
2. Build package with python -m build
3. Upload to TestPyPI
4. Test installation from TestPyPI
5. Verify package page

title: Publish to production PyPI
description:
After TestPyPI verification:
1. Create git tag v0.4.0
2. Upload to production PyPI with 2FA
3. Verify installation works
4. Create GitHub release

title: Add performance benchmarking on each PR (FIXED)
description: Implement automated performance benchmarking in GitHub Actions to track API response times, model loading performance, and caching efficiency across PRs.

title: Set up Dependabot for automatic dependency updates
description: Configure Dependabot to automatically update Python dependencies and GitHub Actions versions. This will help keep dependencies secure and up-to-date.

title: Implement release automation with semantic versioning
description: Set up automated releases using GitHub Actions with semantic versioning. Should include changelog generation, PyPI publishing, and git tagging.

title: Deploy documentation to GitHub Pages
description: Set up automated documentation deployment to GitHub Pages. Could include API reference, usage examples, and integration guides.

title: Add security scanning with CodeQL
description: Integrate GitHub's CodeQL for automated security vulnerability scanning. This will help identify potential security issues in code and dependencies.

title: Publish plugin to PyPI
description: Package and publish llm-poe plugin to Python Package Index (PyPI) for easy installation via 'llm install llm-poe'. Requires package configuration, versioning, and testing of installation process.

title: Increase test coverage from 94% to >95%
description: Identify and add tests for uncovered code paths to push coverage above 95%. Current coverage is excellent at 94% but there's room for improvement.

title: Implement 3 test cases to reach 95.56% coverage
description:
Add test cases identified in coverage analysis:
1. Dynamic detection with generic HTTP URL (line 166)
2. Image model with max_tokens option (line 327)
3. Audio streaming with invalid JSON (lines 464-465)

This will increase coverage from 94.07% to 95.56%.
